data.title: Cheap Flights to Sao Tome and Principe
data.meta_description: Compare cheap flights to Sao Tome and Principe with TAP Air Portugal. Enjoy the service of a premiere airline flying to Sao Tome and Principe. Start searching flight deals.
data.text:
Often called simply Sao Tome, the island country of Sao Tome and Principe is situated off the west coast of Africa. A former Portuguese colony, it was once a major producer of sugar, coffee, and cocoa. You can fly to Sao Tome and Principe with TAP Air Portugal, enjoying great in-flight services and facilities, such as tasty meals, good entertainment, and access to the digital magazine, UP, via the TAP mobile app.

Explore Sao Tome and Principe

Some highlights of this island nation include:

Finding secluded beaches on Principe and feeling as though youâ€™ve discovered a slice of paradise, with amazing diving and snorkelling.

Viewing an array of flora and fauna in the dense rainforests, and reconnecting with splendid nature in Obo National Park, home to numerous species of orchid and a pristine waterfall.

Being stunned at the Boca do Inferno blowhole.

Visiting rocas, colonial-period plantations.

Shopping for souvenirs and gifts at the lively Sao Tome Market, and admiring the picturesque colonial architecture.

Discovering Sao Tome and Principe

Renting a car or joining a tour is the best way to enjoy the country. Book your flights to Sao Tome and Principe with TAP and go somewhere different!
